results.content:
I have just been through the first three chapters and i have found them to be useful and engaging. What is most interesting about the course is the quiz and assignment after each section. I will accept, i did get few questions wrong in the quiz which was good. As i could go back and check the video again for what i missed.

And then i went through the to-do list for assignments to check my knowledge on what i have learned.

results.content: Truly admire your wordpress tutorials. I have no technical background but by learning this simple tutorial i managed to create my own blog.  I'm recommending this course to my folks.

Highly recommended!
